bug.author: JohnSmith2007
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
I've been dealing with several errors with this program for the past month, and i thought i finally figured it out. apparently i was wrong. <denchmark-h:h2>Step to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Installed using Conda Run as python -m spleeter separate -i C:\Users\smcco\Music\Customs i've made\Comin_in_Hot.mp3 -c mp3 spleeter:5stems -o /output/C:\Users\smcco\Music\ Got spleeter: error: unrecognized arguments: spleeter:5stems
<denchmark-h:h2>Output</denchmark-h>
(base) C:\Users\smcco>python -m spleeter separate -i C:\Users\smcco\Music\Customs i've made\Comin_in_Hot.mp3 -c mp3 spleeter:5stems -o /output/C:\Users\smcco\Music\ usage: spleeter [-h] {separate,train,evaluate} ... spleeter: error: unrecognized arguments: spleeter:5stems <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
OS Windows
Installation type Conda
RAM available 16GB
Hardware spec GPU: nVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti, Intel UHD Graphics 630 / CPU: Intel i5-8300
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional context</denchmark-h>
I think this program hates me.

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSmith2007>@JohnSmith2007</denchmark-link>
Could you please look at the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/wiki/2.-Getting-started#using-5stems-model>documentation</denchmark-link> ? you have (once again) made an error in your command syntax ( a missing ) it's not an issue with the program. Please be aware that creating bug reports like this is time consuming on our side. Before opening a ticket please make sure that your problem is not in your command or already solved in the FAQ.
